title: gurunaatan avanE
sahitya:
gurunAthan avanE avanai nI kumbiDu nan manamE 



anupallavi



iru vikArap-paghaiyin iDargaLaik-kaLaindavan irunda paDiyirukkum

rahasiyam arindavan



caraNam 1



AshaiyAl khArattai azhitta jnAna dhIran amaidiyil AdiDum

annattaip-pOnravan

mOsham pOgAdulagil muTrilum vizhittavan mummala vAzhkkaiyin mOhattai

azhittavan



caraNam 2



yAraiyum igazhAmal yAraiyum pugazhAmal yAraiyum kenjAmal

yAraiyum konjAmal

UrukkupakAriyAi yArukkum bhAraminri uNmaip-poduveLiyil ulaviDum yOgiyAm 



caraNam 3



caNDa mArutattilum shaliyAda viLakkavan avan tamaviruL pOkkiDum

tangak-kadirOnavan

koNDalishaittiDak-kudikku mayilanaiyAn kOkam shOkam enrE kUvum

kuyilanaiyAn
